#summary Explains how to get started with the module

= Introduction =

This page provides a complete guide to getting up an running with the transmem transactional memory module for use with simics.


= Pre-requisites =

The information provided here is largely applicable only to local ([http://www.cs.man.ac.uk/apt APT group]) users, but should be obvious enough that most people with a working knowledge of simics can follow the guide.

This guide is split into 3 parts:

 *[http://code.google.com/p/transmem/wiki/InstallingSimics Installing simics (local user specific)]
 *[Installing and compiling the transmem module]
 *[Running the STAMP benchmark suite]
